EmailTemplate.description: Marketing Did You Know Program - Retention
EmailTemplate.name: Retention Email
EmailTemplate.subject: Did you know we offer so much more than office supplies?
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Did You Know We’re Taking Care of Business in Exciting New Ways?
Put our full range of solutions and services to work for you.
P.S. Did You Know? Nearly 80 percent of employees feel more valued when coffee is provided. Start simple and choose from 80 varieties of coffee, tea and cocoa.
